com.anotherservice.util

Class Context

  • Object
    • Context

  • public class Context
extends Object
    This class stores different ClassLoader contexts. Contexts can be registered with any key, ideally: an object instance with the ClassLoader it belongs to. This class intends to be used in multi-threaded environments using multiple ClassLoaders; thus, all methods are synchronized.
    Author:
    Simon Uyttendaele

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static ClassLoader get(Object key)
        Returns the ClassLoader associated with the provided key
        Parameters:
        key - the key that was used to register the ClassLoader. Keys behavior is identical to the Map interface keys behavior.
        Returns:
        the associated ClassLoader or null if no match is found

      • add

        public static void add(Object key)
        Registers the current Thread's ClassLoader with the provided key
        Parameters:
        key - the registration key

      • add

        public static void add(Object key,
       ClassLoader context)
        Registers the provided ClassLoader with the provided key
        Parameters:
        key - the registration key
        context - the ClassLoader

      • remove

        public static void remove(Object key)
        Removes the association between the provided key and the ClassLoader context
        Parameters:
        key - the key that was used to register the ClassLoader
        Note:
        • The ClassLoader may not be completely released if it is still registered with another key
        • If the key is not found, nothing happens

      • defined

        public static boolean defined(Object key)
        Checks if the key's Type is is defined in the current Thread's ClassLoader.
        Parameters:
        key - an object instance. The ClassLoader of the key is retrieved by key.getClass().getClassLoader()
        Returns:
        true if the ClassLoader of the key is the same as the current Thread's. false otherwise

      • defined

        public static boolean defined(Object key,
              ClassLoader context)
        Checks if the key's Type is the provided ClassLoader.
        Parameters:
        key - key an object instance. The ClassLoader of the key is retrieved by key.getClass().getClassLoader()
        context - the ClassLoader to check against
        Returns:
        true if the ClassLoader of the key is the same as the provided context. false otherwise

      • registered

        public static boolean registered(Object key)
        Checks if the provided key is registered to a ClassLoader
        Parameters:
        key - the registration key
        Returns:
        true if a ClassLoader is registered with this key. false otherwise

      • created

        public static boolean created(Object key)
        Checks if the ClassLoader registered with this key is the same as the current Thread's
        Parameters:
        key - the registration key
        Returns:
        true if the ClassLoader registered with this key is the same as the current Thread's. false otherwise

      • created

        public static boolean created(Object key,
              ClassLoader context)
        Checks if the ClassLoader registered with this key is the same as the provided one
        Parameters:
        key - the registration key
        context - the ClassLoader to check against
        Returns:
        true if the ClassLoader registered with this key is the same as the provided context. false otherwise

      • wrap

        public static void wrap(Object key)
        Changes the current Thread's ClassLoader to the one registered with the target key
        Parameters:
        key - the registration key
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if no ClassLoader is registered with that key

      • change

        public static void change(ClassLoader context)
        Changes the current Thread's ClassLoader to the one provided
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if context is null
